title: Ruth’s return to the road: ‘I think I needed a sabbatical more than a retirement’
content:
After retiring from the WorldTour in 2021, then racing two seasons of the Life Time Grand Prix series, Ruth Edwards is returning to the sport she loves.

Read the full article at Ruth’s return to the road: ‘I think I needed a sabbatical more than a retirement’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
